mapper.select: select question.id question_info_id, question.content, question.options, question.analysis, question.answer, wrong_book.student_answer, subject.id subject_id, subject.name subject_name, wrong_book.mark, wrong_book.question_mark from question_info question, student_wrong_book wrong_book, subject_info subject where question.id = wrong_book.question_info_id and question.subject_id = subject.id
